headline: NiSource: Well-Positioned With Data Center Upside (Rating Upgrade)
summary: Given the promising growth prospects and less material dilution, I recommend buying NiSource shares, expecting them to surpass $41 within a year. Read more here.

headline: Southern's Unit Expands Millers Branch Solar Facility in Texas
summary: Southern's unit Southern Power expands its Millers Branch Solar Facility, adding 132 MW to reach a total capacity of 512 MW.
